settings.title: Settings
settings.adultDesc: Standard BMI calculation for adults over 20 years.
settings.noteDesc: Calculation for minors uses growth charts (percentiles) which require precise age and sex to be valid.

messages.underweight: Your BMI is below the healthy range. It is advisable to consult a specialist.
messages.normal: Excellent! You have a healthy weight. Keep up your good habits.
messages.overweight: Your BMI indicates overweight. Small changes in diet and activity can help.
messages.obesity1: Your BMI indicates Obesity Class I. It is important to look after your cardiovascular health.
messages.obesity2: Your BMI indicates Obesity Class II. Consult a doctor for a personalized plan.
messages.obesity3: Your BMI indicates Morbid Obesity. Seeking medical advice is crucial.
